extension.valueMarkdown: This value set contains a point-in-time expansion enumerating the codes that meet the value set intent. As new versions of the code systems used by the value set are released, the contents of this expansion will need to be updated to incorporate newly defined codes that meet the value set intent. Before, and periodically during production use, the value set expansion contents SHOULD be updated.
Use the following LOINC query: Phencyclidine (=system:Urine) AND NOT status:DEPRECATED

name: PHENCYCLIDINE_URINE_DRUG_SCREENING_TESTS
title: Phencyclidine urine drug screening tests
publisher: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)

contact.name: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)

purpose: Identification of urine drug tests where results can be used when considering pain management therapy

contains.display: Phencyclidine [Mass/volume] in Urine by Confirmatory method
Phencyclidine [Mass/volume] in Urine by Screen method
Phencyclidine [Presence] in Urine by Confirmatory method
Phencyclidine [Presence] in Urine by Confirm method >20 ng/mL
Phencyclidine [Presence] in Urine by SAMHSA confirm method
Phencyclidine [Presence] in Urine by SAMHSA screen method
Phencyclidine [Presence] in Urine by Screen method
Phencyclidine [Presence] in Urine by Screen method >25 ng/mL
Phencyclidine cutoff [Mass/volume] in Urine for Confirmatory method
Phencyclidine cutoff [Mass/volume] in Urine for Screen method
